project.text1: This is a large-scale socially significant project. The cultural and entertainment cluster in Tashkent is one of the city's new landmarks.
project.text2: A multifunctional residential complex created to provide convenience for the population of Uzbekistan.
project.text3: Fonon is a jewelry manufacturing plant built in Uzbekistan in 2020 based on Italian factories. Fonon is the only major company in Central Asia that produces jewelry from precious metals in both European and Eastern styles.
project.text4: An international kindergarten and school located in the Tashkent City International Business Center.
project.text5: This is an educational institution that provides knowledge at an international level.
project.text6: A magnificent residential complex in the heart of the capital.

news.text1: Who is a construction project manager?
news.text2: Discover Invest has several construction project managers. This specialist is responsible for the successful implementation of the construction project entrusted to them.
news.text5: The intricate design of the halls creates a sense of comfort even before you enter the apartment, and the convenient navigation system helps you easily reach the desired floor or exit to the area.
news.text7: The transport infrastructure allows easy movement to any point in the city: you only need to choose the desired route.
news.text8: We continue to introduce you to Discover Invest's many projects.
news.text9: We continue to introduce you to the multifunctional projects of 'ATAEV BAHODIR BUILD'. One of them is the 'New Choshtepa' residential complex, built in the Yangixoyat district of Tashkent.
